gallery-intro: Click on the allyship capability you'd like to explore below.
gallery-footnote: Not sure which capability to choose? Take a look at the allyship capability model
gallery-section-1-module-1-text: Lean into allyship by asking questions that will increase your awareness and help you take actions that hold yourself and others accountable.
gallery-section-1-module-2-text: Dive into allyship with this micro-learning that will help you discover additional practices to respectfully intervene on behalf of others.
gallery-section-1-module-3-text: Lead the way on allyship by taking up a challenge issued by our leaders to actively seek out and challenge inequities.
gallery-section-2-module-1-text: Lean into allyship by asking questions to become more power cognizant and taking actions to empower others daily.
gallery-section-2-module-2-text: Dive into allyship with this micro-learning that will help you discover additional practices to amplify your influence and share your power with others.
gallery-section-2-module-3-text: Lead the way on allyship by taking up a challenge issued by our leaders that will help you elevate the ideas and strengths of others around you.
gallery-section-3-module-1-text: Lean into allyship by asking questions to broaden your perspective and increase your self-awareness about the lived experiences of others.
gallery-section-3-module-2-text: Dive into allyship with this micro-learning in which you will explore the importance of being committed to learning and unlearning on your allyship journey.
gallery-section-3-module-3-text: Lead the way on allyship by taking up a challenge issued by our leaders to accelerate your commitment to being a life-long learner.
